attributes.title: Pentel Twist-Erase II
attributes.description:
Created on March 1, 2010 by cman2790 on Sourcemap.org:

0.7mm Automatic Pencils (Mechanical Pencils) with Twist-Eraser

attributes.name: Aluminum
attributes.title: Aluminum
attributes.description: This Aluminum makes up for a very small percentage of the product. The aluminum is used in this product as the clip and the tip of the pencil.

attributes.name: Polyethylene (Plastic)
attributes.title: Polyethylene (Plastic)
attributes.description: Polyethylene or plastic makes up for the majority framework that holds this mechanical pencil together.

attributes.name: Hi-Polymer Lead
attributes.title: Hi-Polymer Lead
attributes.description: Hi-polymer lead is composed of synthetic resin, graphite and carbon. This is used in the product to write with.
